citations.narrative:
The registrant did not have a developed and documented contingency plan available for review at time of inspection. The
lack of an adequate contingency plan could increase the risk of not being able to safeguard animals during emergencies
or disasters. The registrant must develop, document and follow an appropriate plan to provide for the humane handling,
treatment, transportation, housing and care of animals in the event of an emergency or disaster that could reasonably be
anticipated for the species on hand. The plan must address all the components of section 2.134.
Correct by 03 December 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant.
n

narrative:
2.134(a) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The registrant did not have a developed and documented contingency plan available for review at time of inspection. The 
lack of an adequate contingency plan could increase the risk of not being able to safeguard animals during emergencies 
or disasters. The registrant must develop, document and follow an appropriate plan to provide for the humane handling, 
treatment, transportation, housing and care of animals in the event of an emergency or disaster that could reasonably be 
anticipated for the species on hand. The plan must address all the components of section 2.134. 
 
Correct by 03 December 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant. 
 
 n
